Based on their message, it seems they are interested in the fantasy genre. Therefore, I would recommend two of the most iconic and beloved fantasy films ever made: 

- "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" (2001)
- "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring" (2001)

Both of these films are epic in scope, filled with memorable characters, stunning visuals, and breathtaking action sequences. And both of them also have an incredibly compelling and emotionally resonant story at their core.

So there you go - two highly recommended classic fantasy films that are sure to delight and enchant any true fan of the genre.
